snippet: Two chimpanzees escaped a Las Vegas backyard on Thursday, with at least one of them jumping on a police car before officers killed one and tranquilized the other, the authorities said.
abstract: Nevada police kill one chimpanzee and tranquilize another that had escaped from a Las Vegas backyard.
lead_paragraph: Two chimpanzees escaped a Las Vegas backyard on Thursday, with at least one of them jumping on a police car before officers killed one and tranquilized the other, the authorities said.
